zh.title: 联系地图
zh.address: 地址：中国上海市宝山区南陈路333号，上海大学计算机工程与科学学院419.
zh.transportation: 交通：地铁7号线南陈路站，公共汽车767号南陈路上大路站或者南陈路四号桥站.

en.title: Contact Map
en.address: Address: No. 333 Nanchen Road, Baoshan District, Shanghai, School of Computer Engineering and Science, Shanghai University, Room 419.
en.transportation: Transportation: Metro Line 7 Nanchen Road Station, Bus Route 767 Nanchen Road-Shangda Road Station or Nanchen Road-Fourth Bridge Station.

ja.title: 連絡先マップ
ja.address: 住所：中国上海市宝山区南陳路333号、上海大学コンピュータ工学・科学学院419号室。
ja.transportation: 交通：地下鉄7号線南陳路駅、公共バス767号南陳路上大路駅または南陳路四号橋駅。
